section.title: Widget LayerList
section.para: This section is coded in MVP. Use an instance of the the presenter LayerListPresenterImpl with the appropriate MapWidget instance. The view is automaticcaly injected into the presenter via the ViewManager. By default, LayerListView is used as the view class. To make use of a custom view, create a view class from the LayerListPresenter.View, e.g. myCustumView interface and register this view to the ViewManager via the entry point class of this plugin:
To enable drag/drop functionality, call the method of the presenter: setDragDropEnabled(boolean dragDropEnabled).
